name: Blocky Dungeons
description:
Blocky Dungeons is a 2D Side-Scrolling, RPG-MMO Game that is currently
being developed by Zentox Technologies. Inside the world of Blocky
Dungeons, You can..

  • Earn Bucks by slaying creatures that rise from the depths of the Blocky Universe.
  • Spend your Bucks on things in the Blocky Market such as clothing, perks, upgrades and more.
  • Explore new dungeons set by the gods of Blocky Dungeons every week in the Dungeon Hub.
  • Meet new friends and build your own community's within the game.
